alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 9:15PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Garvin, southeastern Stephens, northwestern Carter and Murray Counties through 945 PM CST... At 915 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ratliff City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sulphur, Davis, Wynnewood, Elmore City, Velma, Katie, Dougherty, Foster, Tatums, Ratliff City, Pooleville, Lake Of The Arbuckles, Turner Falls, Hennepin, Graham, Fox and Pernell. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 47 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
